fields.name: Don't Walk Away
fields.description: Don’t Walk Away, is an upbeat and warm vocal house track. The song is about “holding on to what you got when life gets tough in a relationship”. The teasing buildup vs. a more relaxed drop creates an energetic but warm atmosphere with the brassy lead melody. The fact that the buildup seems more intense than the drop is untraditional and unique.

fields.name: Darkest Love
fields.description: The composition consists of melodic deep vocals by Kieran Fowkes, minted with a mid-range spacious lead. The song is dominated by the sub-frequency domain and intertwined with harmonic chord progression, sparky synths and mysterious pads.

fields.name: The Sky
fields.description: Expect The Sky from Nikolay Cranner & Batuhan CLK to transport you into a world of your own as flushes of their organic sounds flood through the speakers from the moment you press play
